hero.title: Multi‚Å∫LLM
hero.subtitle: AI Comparison Tool
hero.description: Professional AI Comparison Tool that supports horizontal comparison, batch Q&A, drag-and-drop sorting, and responsive layout. Compare multiple AI models side-by-side with ease.

sideByComparison.title: Side-by-Side Comparison
sideByComparison.description: Compare multiple AI models simultaneously with horizontal layout and synchronized scrolling.

batchQA.title: Batch Q&A
batchQA.description: Send the same question to multiple AI models at once and compare their responses instantly.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Sorting
dragDrop.description: Customize your workspace by reordering AI models with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices with adaptive layouts and touch-friendly controls.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Boost productivity with customizable keyboard shortcuts for quick navigation and actions.

customization.title: Extensive Customization
customization.description: Configure settings, manage site preferences, and personalize your AI comparison experience.

models.title: Supported AI Models
models.note: And many more AI platforms with continuous updates!

download.title: Download Multi‚Å∫LLM
download.description: Available for all major browsers with optimized builds for each platform.

edge.title: Microsoft Edge
edge.description: Optimized for Edge with native integration

firefox.title: Mozilla Firefox

step1.title: Install Extension
step1.description: Download and install Multi‚Å∫LLM from your browser's extension store.

step2.title: Configure Settings
step2.description: Customize your AI model preferences and layout settings in the options page.

step3.title: Start Comparing
step3.description: Use keyboard shortcuts (Alt+Shift+M) or click the extension icon to open the comparison view.

step4.title: Ask Questions
step4.description: Type your question once and see responses from multiple AI models simultaneously.

about.title: About Multi‚Å∫LLM
about.description1: Multi‚Å∫LLM is a professional AI comparison tool designed to streamline your interactions with multiple AI models. Built with TypeScript and modern web technologies, it provides a seamless experience across all major browsers.
about.description2: The extension supports horizontal comparison views, batch question processing, and extensive customization options. Whether you're a researcher, developer, or AI enthusiast, Multi‚Å∫LLM helps you get the most out of your AI interactions.

download.title: Download Multi‚Å∫LLM for {browser}
download.description: You will be redirected to the {store} where you can download and install Multi‚Å∫LLM.
